column2: "I was thinking of preparing a special venue for the celebration event!"
"One idea I had was to put everyone in a dark space, and project our memories onto the landscape around so everyone can watch them together."
"We could turn up the colour, add sound and have it all moving... It would be just like a planetarium!"

"As for what we could show...
I want to hear what you think! Could you do a quest somewhere where you have a lot of happy memories?"
